property.name: mapred.job.tracker
property.description: Host or IP and port of JobTracker.

property.name: mapred.system.dir
property.description: Path on the HDFS where where the MapReduce framework stores system files.Note: This is in the default filesystem (HDFS) and must be accessible from both the server and client machines.

property.name: mapred.local.dir
property.description: Comma-separated list of paths on the local filesystem where temporary MapReduce data is written. Note: Multiple paths help spread disk i/o.
